pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computer Model Calibration for Deterministic and Stochastic Simulators // Implements the Bayesian calibration model described in Pratola and Chkrebtii (2018) DOI:10.5705/ss.202016.0403 for stochastic and deterministic simulators. Additive and multiplicative discrepancy models are currently supported. See http://www.matthewpratola.com/software for more information and examples.
